description: When Genna welcomes her son into the world she is stricken by his appearance. All the nurses in her small-town hospital are convinced he is cursed. How far will she go to spare him suffering? Praise for Her Harlequin Baby: "Angela Meadon delivers a dark, visceral, deeply human story. In very few words, she manages to convey the pain of what should be a joyful moment turned horrific and sad. The ending, while heart-wrenching is inevitable and perfect. Well done." -Ken MacGregor "...Meadon did an extraordinary job here. The tie-in with the disease and the tiger is compelling, frightening, and sad. This is a very memorable story, and told well." -Sydney Leigh
title: Her Harlequin Baby
